name: RCDC
description:
Try to survive as many waves of hostile robots as you can!

Keyboard controls:

Movement: WASD

Aiming & shooting: IJKL or cursor keys

Touch controls:

Movement: Hold and drag on the left side of the screen

Aiming & shooting: Hold and drag on the right side of the screen

Touch controls are not recommended unless you have a large screen and transparent thumbs.
